articles.description: Former England bowler Steven Finn explains why India superstar Jasprit Bumrah is the most complete fast bowler of all time after he takes 5-83 in the first Test.
articles.title: Jasprit Bumrah: India star is most complete fast bowler in history - Steven Finn

articles.description: Two-time NBA champion Kevin Durant will join the Houston Rockets in a blockbuster move from the Phoenix Suns.
articles.title: Kevin Durant NBA trade: Forward will join Houston Rockets from Phoenix Suns

articles.description: A day after Jobe Bellingham scored his first goal for Bundesliga side Borussia Dortmund, older brother Jude rescued Real Madrid with a strike of his own.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: Real Madrid star scores and then ignites friendly rivalry with brother Jobe

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz arrived in London with "no expectations" but with Wimbledon only eight days away he has sent an ominous message to his rivals.
articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz's Queen's title makes him 'red hot favourite' for Wimbledon

articles.description: The Premier League writes to Chelsea over the club's position with ticket re-sellers - amid controversy over Todd Boehly's involvement in Vivid Seats
articles.title: Premier League contact Chelsea over Boehly's Vivid Seats stake

articles.description: American Keegan Bradley pips England's Tommy Fleetwood on the 18th hole to claim the Travelers Championship.
articles.title: Travelers Championship: Tommy Fleetwood denied first PGA Tour title by Keegan Bradley

articles.description: Harry Brook's sparkling 99 helps England almost match India's first-innings total, before Ben Stokes strikes to leave the first Test beautifully poised.
articles.title: England vs India: Ben Stokes strikes after Harry Brook hits 99 at Headingley

articles.description: Verbal jousting on British and Irish Lions tours is as much a part of the deal as the rugby itself - and the mind games started anew in recent days, writes Tom English.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Mind games as much a part of Lions folklore as rucks and mauls

articles.description: Tottenham's Mathys Tel scores a late winner as France recover to beat Denmark and reach the European Under-21 Championship semi-finals.
articles.title: Denmark U21 2-3 France U21: Tottenham's Mathys Tel scores winner in comeback win

articles.description: Marketa Vondrousova claims her first title since winning Wimbledon two years ago by beating Chinese qualifier Wang Xinyu in the Berlin Open final.
articles.title: Berlin Open: Marketa Vondrousova beats Wang Xinyu in final
